data.name: Wunderhaven
data.detailed_description:
Wunderhaven is an expansive adventure game with elements from multiple genres of video game. Action RPG. Tower Defense. Farm Simulator. Dungeon Crawler. Call it a multi-genre.

You are peasant with nothing to your name. You've been summoned to in a last ditch effort to save the economically failing kingdom of Wunderhaven. It is up to you to decide if you want to do what it takes to restore the prosperity and wealth of this kingdom or if you'd rather build up your own resources and let them fend for themselves. Your decision influence your outcomes, may luck be on your side.



Features:

Use your tools and energy to gather resources and materials from nearby locals. Use these to construct buildings and purchase upgrades in whatever way you see fit.



Transform your decrepit homestead into a production powerhouse. Build machines and plant crops to generate wealth and reputation. Learn additional recipes and unlock as you progress through the following distinct professions: Fishing, Survival, Combat, Arcana, Smithing, Agriculture, Reputation, and Animal Handling



Interact and build relationships with over 50 townsfolk to unlocks recipes and secrets.



Explore vast procedurally generated worlds. Interact with hundreds of animals and enemies in unique rogues like instances. Procedural generation provide players an opportunity to min and max with fast paced combat and puzzles.



Adapt and adjust as the seasons change. Each season brings unique challenges and events to participate in.



Forge your own path to the top. Your decisions determine your success and your success determines your outcomes. Good luck.

data.short_description: Welcome to Wunderhaven. You're the lone surviving descendant of a not-so-legendary line of peasants. You've been summoned to a failing kingdom in the hopes that your hard work can spur a new wave of wealth and prosperity. Will you replenish the coffers and save the kingdom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 | 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel I5 | 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 | AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 | 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel i7 | 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
